description: An operation on a denormalized story

type.description: Identifies this as an ANS operation

operation.description: The identifier of the operation being performed

date.description: When the operation should be considered performed

id.description: The id of the item being operated

branch.description: The name of the branch within Story API that this operation occurs on, if any

published.description: Identifies this item as published or not

version.description: The version of ANS this item is written in

created.description: Identifies this item as created or updated.

trigger.title: Operation Trigger
trigger.description: Metadata about the primary source update that triggered this operation. These fields can be used by downstream consumers as an efficient way of determining the relevance of an operation.

type.title: Trigger Type
type.description: The type of update that was consumed in order to produce this update. If this operation is the result of a referent update, than this type may or may not match the type of document in the body. For example, suppose story A contains image B and story C. If B is updated, then an operation may be produced with source 'image' and a body of story A (with updated image metadata.) If C is updated, then an operation may be produced with source 'story' and the body of story A.

id.title: Trigger ID
id.description: The id of the document whose update was consumed in order to produce this update. If this operation is the result of a referent update, than this id will not match the id of the document in the body (except the case where a document references itself.)

referent_update.title: Referent Update
referent_update.description: If true, this update was triggered by an update to a referenced element in the document rather than the document itself.
